website_summaries.verdict: This model has some quirks, and is best suited for parents who don't need a portable model and children that aren't overly rambunctious.
pros: Offers a spacious design with rounded panels for added safety
can be used inside or outside
cons: While it's reasonably durable, some parents find that very active youngsters are able to make it wobble or shake
Though rare, there were a few incidences of kids getting their feet stuck in the door slats

customer_reviews.title: We loved this play area until we felt a safe zone ...
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old granddaughter was only in the play area about 5-10 minutes watching sesame street one morning and got her leg stuck in the space between the rails. The Fire Department had to come and cut the post the free her leg out! I wanted to alert the manufacture directly but I was unable to locate a website or Facebook page. The spaces between the rails need to be closer! We loved this play area until we felt a safe zone became an unsafe zone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I can sit next to this pin/mat ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I can sit next to this pin/mat without worrying about her falling knocking her head. (we are moving into our new, which is why I move the pin in front of the television. Not usual spot, before I get attacked for child endangerment. lol the television is also attached to wall.) Just wanted to share for those pending about purchasing this pin, it's great. I purchased 2, but didn't add all the panels. I also didn't add the teddy bear sticker, she would definitely peel and try to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma

customer_reviews.title: Nice Play Yard
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for a bigger play area. Pack and play just doesn't have enough room - this is easily set up and can be used indoor or outdoor. Purchased the BCP Kids Soft Cushioned Toddler Play Mat here on Amazon and that is a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Cheezer

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this playpen! Sturdy, bright and fun. Has a few toys inside that even bigger kids (3yr olds) want to play in it. Big enough for multiple children to play in it at one time. it has suction cups under each panel that I'm hoping will work good on our tile floors when they get installed in a few weeks. I found a mat (patchwork toddler play mat) that is 1.5 inches thick and fits perfectly inside that will vision little ones falls.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L Funk

customer_reviews.title: Love the gate for my child
customer_reviews.text: Love the gate for my child. However, please be careful of the Bears that stick on. I would recommend not putting them on as my son tore off the arm of one last night and put it in his mouth and it got stuck in his throat and he could not breathe. Luckily I was able to scoop it out but I threw away all the other bears. Please be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got this sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this.....our 15 month old is crawling and trying to walk every where. On the rare occasions I have to have him home while I work this has been a life saver. Two days after it arrived he had to stay home due to a low fever. I could work with him in sight and watch him without chasing him from room to room. He seems to love it and is happy playing with his toys inside. It was easy to put together, though I haven't put the stickers on yet. I know those will be a fun experience from other toys with stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Roby

customer_reviews.title: Not the item advertised
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the same item pictured or described, the gaps are too wide, it’s too small to fit with my ECR playmat and it’s not stable. Requested a refund but waiting to hear back from the seller
customer_reviews.author: civel1

customer_reviews.title: What a complete game-changer!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this playpen. He has more room compared to the pack n play. He is crawling now so it's nice to leave him somewhere where he is perfectly safe and have more freedom to crawl. The playpen is very sturdy even when it is on the carpet/rug. I love that I can easily move it around and just take a few pieces. Could also shape it however I like. So happy that I have more freedom now to do housework without worrying about my baby. I should have got this sooner. It is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: E. ChampionTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: The playpen was easy to put together and easy wipe down
customer_reviews.text: This playpen turned out to be everything it said it would be. Originally I bought 2 because I thought I'd need extra space for my twin girls but one was enough. They are able to crawl and roll with enough room. The playpen was easy to put together and easy wipe down. I dod notice that the decals peel off essy but only because I put one on wrong and had to remove and reapply. My girls love the activity panel so much that Im going to use the panel from my extra set so that they can have two.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Heads up that I ordered this playpen (doublechecked my order ...
customer_reviews.text: Heads up that I ordered this playpen (doublechecked my order history), but what arrived was this one:  They're both 8 panels, but some slight differences. Working in this one's favor, the door slats are narrower (the one I ordered did have a few complaints about baby feet getting stuck). The bear stickers are different, etc. Both have high reviews so I'll keep what arrived and see how it does, but wanted to give notice that what's in the picture isn't necessarily going to match what you receive. Mine was different.
customer_reviews.author: RPG_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to gate off living room
customer_reviews.text: We actually used this as a sectional to cover/gate our living room - 2 panels are blocking the gas fireplace (unplugged), 2 blocking area behind couch, section with gate near "exit" from room. Works well for our open concept living room/dining room/kitchen which would other wise be pretty impossible to really baby proof (living in an apartment so space and options are limited).
customer_reviews.author: Molly M

customer_reviews.title: The suction cups to sturdy the playpen only partly work
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups to sturdy the playpen only partly work, and sometimes the panels come apart with some difficulty. It would be nice if playpen had a mat that fit a configuration of the panels for our wood floors. Through no fault of this playpen, this setup does not work well for our child who prefers trying to escape its boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Best purchased Ever
customer_reviews.text: Even with the shut down due to Covid 19 my package arrived in less than 4 days. It was easy to assemble and my kids ages 1 & 3 both boys love it. It holds pretty good with all the shaking and banging of the kids. I love and recommend all parents to have this. I got this because after having 5 kids I realized that having a playpen is a big waste of money. I was constantly buying new play pens because its not possible to truly clean a playpen. This set can be wiped down. I recommend you buy the mat that fits perfectly inside and can be wiped cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIE

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews but I read them constantly. I wanted to tell other parents considering this playpen to go for it! It is perfect for my baby, she can play and her two older brothers can actually play with her. There is just enough space that she has plenty of room but the playpen doesn’t take up the whole room. I like that it can be made into whatever shape is desired. I would definitely recommend this product! We didn’t add the stickers after reading other reviews that they are a choking hazard. Nice colors and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: cbear216

customer_reviews.title: Baby got foot stuck
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the playpen is as described. It was easy to set up and pretty sturdy. Mine didn't come with suction cups which is fine because it's on carpet. The reason I gave 3 stars, is that my baby got her foot stuck. She's in her rolling around stage and I guess her foot went through the slat and she twisted it around. Since then I've been a helicopter parent while she's in there... and it hasn't happened since. Also, the stickers aren't great, my baby ripped them off. :p BUT, it's cute and does it's intended purpose. Very roomy
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This death trap allowed my son to stick his leg through the slots and fall and bust his head. Don’t get this it’s too easy for children to slip their joints through the slots. Had to cut it to get his leg out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We bought this for our big living room so our 10 month old could walk and crawl around and play with all her toys, instead of getting into our dogs toys and water dish, etc... She loves the panel with the toys and the teddy bear stickers were also a nice little feature. Suction cups are not the greatest at staying down but panels are very sturdy and we don't have to worry about her knocking it over. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. F.

customer_reviews.title: Received a day sooner than expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. This is our second play yard. The first one worked out so well, we decided we wanted one for another room in our house. I ordered the first one from a different seller. It took almost two weeks to get all the parts. I ordered the same play yard from this seller on Monday, today is Wednesday morning and it was just delivered. Totally happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammyoeo

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, it seems firm enough for the baby and my for my 4 year old that keeps jumping over the panels. The baby likes to play with the activity panel. Love the door access and the panels are easy to disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Please be aware that your children’s arms and legs will get stuck... It’s a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this playpen until my son damn near broke his arm... It was stuck and he could not get it out and this is happened multiple times but this one was the worst. I cannot stop crying because it was that hard to get his arm out I could not believe it
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This playpen makes it possible to put our one year old for a few minutes in a safe area where he can't immediately hurt himself. It is definitely a quality of life improvement for busy parents. He won't be happy in the playpen for more than 5 minutes or so, but that is not the product's fault. We eventually converted the playpen into a divider to section off a large area of the family room. It is still sturdy enough for our baby and having a larger play area keeps him happier.
customer_reviews.author: Fatih Akgul

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy play area!
customer_reviews.text: Tjhis very colorful play area is very sturdy and larger than I expected! It was very easy to put together and move, since I had to move it around in my den trying to find the best location for it. The gate is strong but easy to operate and I am really looking forward to being able to corral my crawling grandson, who can scoot on his tummy faster than the speed of grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for our baby once she started crawling & pulling herself up. We feel safe leaving the room for a bit while she’s in here. We didn’t put the bear stickers on because she likes to pick at labels/stickers and put them in her mouth... she’s already tried to do that to the warning label.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: A-
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We have a quarantined living room now!! The only improvement to this would be some kind of feet that would make a few pieces of free standing wall more stable. The little suction cups do ok if it's connected to other pieces and arrange properly. Some snap-on feet that would make one or two pieces stand tall on their own would be fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: TenK

customer_reviews.title: Second one I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. My grandson does not like to sit still and always wants to head for what he shouldn’t be touching. This is also large enough to have all of his favorite toys in there. Gives his mommy a break for sure. Throughout the years, this is the second one I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, except for the stickers! The darn bear stickers were a pain. You don’t need them though. This is been great for our living room. Nice size to keep baby safely entertained. The price is pretty high, but I feel like it’s a quality product that will last us through toddlerhood.
customer_reviews.author: farmfarm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy thick plastic, easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and is easily set up and take down. Sturdy plastic and colorful. My grandson now that he walks just loves the door and activity panel. So glad I paid the extra $ for those two panels! You can configure it anyway and use it in doors or out!!! I love it, my son and daughter in law and grandson all love it!! It’s grandma’s play yard!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Be careful my baby's feet kept getting stuck in the holes. I had to buy bumper padding to put around this play pen so he can't stick his feet in the holes or gaps. Not good for little kids if you cannot monitor them. It's a little better now with the padding around it.
customer_reviews.author: Paj

customer_reviews.title: Great for Babies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product compared to other kids play gates, the toys on the panels and the colors are very bright and fun. I am not sure how durable it is because my son is only 7 months old, so he is not standing up alone yet, or using objects to stand. So far, so good. I have the product on carpet, it doesnt shift at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My first go around at buying such a product, but it is everything you could want in a fenced off pen for you child. Plenty of room to move around, the gate is flexible if you leave the yellow plastic stabilizers off and its very colorful as pictured and comes with some bear stickers to add to its playfulness. My daughter enjoys it and there's plenty of room for toys. Dad also enjoys it so he doesn't have to keep an eye on her 24-7!
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well with flexible size and shape
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things we ever bought. Using it for over a year now, and son is now 2. Still works for his age. It sticks to our laminate floors really well. Doesn’t stick to our carpeted areas, but is sturdy and still great play area even on carpet. Love that it can be so easily disassembled and reassembled in any shape and size. We even bought 2 extra panels so it could be really big when he was learning how to walk. We travel with a few or sometimes all the pieces frequently so it’s nice that they store flat. It’s also been great for building blanket forts ;)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality of this product. We took it out of the box and in just 5 minutes it was fully assembled with our little guy was crawling around. It is very sturdy and very secure. I saw a lot of other similar products with reviews from parents saying it had razor sharp edges and other dangers; but not this product. This product is one of the few things I’ve bought that actually exceeded my expectations. There is no cheap flimsy plastic here. If you want a solid prison for your little explorer, this is the product you need!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O

customer_reviews.title: Kids like activity wall, I dislike the inability to fold
customer_reviews.text: I've put this up a handful of times now I don't like that it doesn't just easily fold you have to take each piece of one by one to put it away. Also some of the plastic connectors are showing wear bc we do take it down every night (use for a home daycare and I just don't have room to leave it up). I do wish I had spent the money on one that folds. The kids love the activity wall and they haven't figured out the gate so that's helpful and great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT! I've now bought two!
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy! I love it for my practicing to stand and crawl 8 month old. He hasnt figured out the gate (its pretty tricky I think we have some time) but loves being inside. I bought a SoftZone Patchwork Toddler Play Mat that fits PERFECTLY inside and has created a really nice area for him to explore without Mom worrying. I originally bought a different gate system and replaced with this one, I now have bought TWO! One for upstairs and one for downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Els

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great, but it's not great quality. If only they had top quality stuff like this. Either way, we've figured out how to put it together to keep the baby in, but whenever we go to move it, it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Katie KatzTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Good product... if only baby would agree!
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice! Easy to install. Reminds me of like a McDonald’s playground material haha. We read other reviews and did not put on the stickers. The only problem is our baby doesn’t like being in here too long... he still wants his freedom! We got it when he was about 7 months old. You may want to start getting a younger baby used to it
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Krofchik

customer_reviews.title: love it but it is big
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the few playpens that have a door and that is this big. It is around 25 sq ft 5'x5'. Was super easy to assemble and my kid loves it so far. The extra room gives you space to get inside with your child which wants to not play alone at times.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Love this playpen
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. We have a highly active 10-month-old boy and it has saved our sanity a couple of times already. Very colorful and easy to put together a enjoys playing in it and we can keep an eye on him . it is plenty big enough and adjustable in size depending on your needs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, so I asked my daughter for her review of this product: "We love the baby fence. The suction cups on the bottom of the panels are a very cool feature that keep the panels in place even when baby pushes on them. She likes the activity panel that features a phone and rolly balls. The stickers on the activity panel are bizarre (really ugly animals doing weird things) but who cares -- baby has no clue. Very high quality and exactly what we needed."
customer_reviews.author: Is Bin

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a room divider
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a divider in my room to keep kitten from playfully attacking my bun. It's sturdy and light weight. No problems. Well almost no problem. My two month old kitten can jump over it. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: NovaKat

customer_reviews.title: Very large and fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very large and works well for us. Very easy assembly. Negatives- suction cups don’t stick on my wood floor and I do NOT recommend putting bear stickers on....they are a major choking hazard. My 10 month old ripped a piece off and was trying to put it in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms who need to keep their kiddies confined ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for moms who need to keep their kiddies confined while trying to do our other duties and is safe. My son easily climbs everything but he does not climb this and has not attempted to climb out......they love the little phone also. I did not put the stickers on because other people told me the kids just rip them off. The balls and toys attached are great and keep them occupied. I put the letter mat down underneath it. Can put in so many shapes or just use two or three panels to block stairs or the kitchen. Has suction cups so it suctions to the floor to prevent it from falling over and moving.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E Huseby

customer_reviews.title: good!
customer_reviews.text: I like this play pen. I'm not sure what the deal is with the bear stickers. Ours didn't have sticky backing. They seem like they could be a choking hazard anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog free play
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job at keeping my baby in and my dogs out. We needed a place for him to play without dog hair on the floors and this works perfect. The bear stickers do curl and peel on its own so I opted to not add them on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Actually pretty good value
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical with this purchase, however, this is a great option if you can get the flooring right. You want something soft enough so that when they tumble they don't hurt themselves and something hard enough that they can hold onto the top and walk around. Also avoid any large soft items as even our 9 month old can escape once he climbs on top. We ended up buying another for my MIL.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vokoun

customer_reviews.title: Beware of counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Love it! However, make sure it was "KIDZONE". I reordered 2nd set as expansion part and it was counterfeit (name,color,size and style was a bit off..), The seller made the returned and refund smooth, but was such a wasted of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: KEN V.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We love this play yard. Our 8 month old will stay in it a very long time and amuse herself, and we know she is safe. It is so easy to put up and take down. Also, it is so flexible in how you set it up, sometimes we keep it in a square and she is fully contained, but then we will open up 2 of the panels and prop them up against the couch so she can still play in it, but also crawl over to us where we are sitting on the couch. The brackets you clip on to the top between the panels adds extra sturdiness. Best investment ever for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Solid, spacious, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, spacious, easy to set up. negatives 1. stickers are near impossible to separate from the backing (score the back please!) 2. The built-in wall games are lame compared to the games in other models from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dobber

customer_reviews.title: Love it baby stays safe
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It keeps my 14 month from getting into everything! I am currently pregnant and the door helps me from keep bending over the gate to pick him up! Much better than his playpen!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Just enough space!! Beautiful colors!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it more & more as she has gotten more use to it. I put all her toys in there & she has a ball. It's also enough space for me, my husband or kids to be in there with her.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W. Jones2

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for having safe area for baby to play.
customer_reviews.text: Great choice. Not crazy about the teddy stickers. Manufacturer should consider printing Teddys on panels. Stickers start to come off on their own and with help from baby.
customer_reviews.author: Abuelita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby boy loves his play pen and his five year old sister likes to play in it too... so there’s plenty of room. It is VERY sturdy. Easy to clean and colorful. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my area rug for my one year old. I find it to be sturdy and efficient. It's enough room for me and him to play in. I would buy this again. The only problem I have, is that the bears rip off easily, and there are no extras provided. My son love playing with the little door too.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. My baby plays insist he this pen since he was 6mo. I work from home so I love to have a place I can put him and know he will be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mafer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent playpen
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this playpen and ECR4Kids SoftZone Patchwork Toddler Play Mat instead of a pack and play. The mat fits perfectly inside the playpen and creates a fairly big, safe, and fun play area for a baby or a toddler. The playpen is sturdy, colorful, has a gate that's easy to operate. One of the panels even has toys on it, which my baby loves. Excellent product -- thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Twin approved
customer_reviews.text: Love the mega pen. It is sturdy and simple to assemble and huge. I got it for my twins and they love it too. I am glad others warned about the little plastic pieces that were left behind from manufacturing because there were a few of those and since I knew to look, it wasn't a problem, just threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Brookeii

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My twin nieces were in need of a place to play that was confined and fun (to give their parents a break). This was so easy to assemble and sturdy. It came on time. I would definitely purchase this item again. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia T P

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if you keep it assembled;))
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy it is and there are enough panels to make the space bigger or smaller. It is very good quality. The only thing I find difficult is taking it a part when needed. The panels are heavy and when they connected , disassemble is hard. Which on the other hand it's a good thing because it means it's a strong structure! My little one jumps on it and it doesn't move one bit!
customer_reviews.author: adi klein

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like this playpen a lot it kept my son from climbing our son safe and entertained when I needed to do some house work.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: One rolling ball got stuck...But overall a fine product
customer_reviews.text: One of the rolling balls got stuck since the 1st day. We did not think it a problem until we find our baby is fighting against that ball everyday. He is frustrated why this one got stuck but the other is rolling fast...We don't want to return the product because we like it overall. I was wondering if they can send us a replacement of the piece with the two rolling balls...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my goddaughter and she loved the little toys included on the play pen. Her favorite is the spinning ball. Very sturdy and no worries of baby hurting her fingers. Momma loves it too. Might buy another for them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, safe play place
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer for us. We have twins and needed a safe place for them to play while cooking. It’s large enough for them to play together but also play individually in the same space. It’s incredibly easy to assemble and disassemble. We bring this with us to Grandma’s house on the weekends. I love the suction cups on the bottom, makes it even sturdier on wood or tile floors. My mother-in-law bought one for her home because she was such a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: Love this! My 5 month old is all over ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My 5 month old is all over the place! We use this with a playmat underneath. It doesn't quite fit around our mat but is easy to maneuver in a way that does the job. Suction cups work great on tile. Easy enough to pick her up or put her down by leaning over gate but door is easy to use. Our 8 year old can even get in with her and hang out with enough room for toys and play area
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Holbert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with this enclosure unit
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a sturdy and sizeable option that allowed our infant son to play freely. The system seems to hold his weight nicely without being flimsy (though make sure the yellow securers are installed), and he is able to cruise along the barrier safely. We actually just bought a second set to expand his play area - would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gate that keeps my little one busy!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product! There’s another baby gate cheaper than this and looks the exact same but I’ve read it was less durable and smaller!! Go with your money on this one, it’s very sturdy even for my 10 month old that loves the climb things! You may need to purchase two of them if you’re planning on having a bigger play space. Overall I’m very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: milkcat

customer_reviews.title: Kid zone playpen
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I strongly believe a playpen should be just just a place to play & not a cage. It’s very spacious, if used in doors prepare yourself for the footprint your going to have to give up. But it does keep the mess in a chaotic square.
customer_reviews.author: Ready2shop

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: With all of the play pens available I decided on this one. Glad I did. Well built and even some interactive play area on one panel. Suction cups are great for a hardwood floor, but I coupled it with an interlocking neoprine floor which I would recommend also. Great place for son to play with his toys and keep him out of things when I need to wash dishes or clean.
customer_reviews.author: bkwashpa

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: Working great! Colorful and easy to assemble. Suction cups hold the panels strong to the ground. Need to be careful while sticking bears, tend to peel off if not exactly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sushil

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: my baby not very like it. But I love it because it can help me protect my baby I can do something else
customer_reviews.author: yiyiwang

customer_reviews.title: Good play pen not great
customer_reviews.text: Decent play pen but the pieces come apart easily and the suction cups don’t really work.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Marie

customer_reviews.title: Childrens playgate
customer_reviews.text: Sticker requires saftey gate to open from inside but in doing so play part of gate has to be facing the outsode of the gate. Pointless. Also the suction cups do not work
customer_reviews.author: Mia suri

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect and gives me time to stop her from doing ...
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of them. They slow down the baby and give her something to play with (she loves the toys as well as opening & closing the door (if it's not latched). It wouldn't keep her in if I left her alone, but that's not why I bought it. For my purposes, it's perfect and gives me time to stop her from doing anything dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old is pulling up on everything and gets into everything that she can see so this was great for keeping her safe but giving her space and room to explore. Pack n' plays simply don't compare. I purchased a floor mat to prevent any hard tumbles or falls when testing her balance. awesome, awesome, awesome!
customer_reviews.author: kenitra smith

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality for the price. My son LOVES it and I love knowing that he is safe if I have to look away for a second. It was so easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: There are better options elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Not good on any type carpet, that normal households have. Has to be a flat floor...otherwise, won't work properly. Stickers that come with it, keep coming off. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: KS2017

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This set is very nice and easy to assemble. I would pick this over a gate for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ta M

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My son loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this! We have since converted it into a wall to block off a section of a room and its holding up great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhóòk3r

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this playpen and it works great for a baby. A time saver for moms! My thumbs up! One thing is I hope they sell extended pieces as well. 12 pieces will be even better to match my mat.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for corralling the baby and giving him a large space to play. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Buckhunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep baby safe! I want to buy a second one so he has a larger area to play in. We also dismantle it to block off the kitchen and bookshelves when he is roaming around free. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: This gate is soo cute! it works great for my little one. It keeps her safe and secure. Just make sure you watch them because their little legs can get stuck through the holes.
customer_reviews.author: buyer2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to my one year old cruising granddaughter who loves pulling herself up and walking all around in it. She'll play in it happily. My 8 month old grandson does the same in the one I sent him. His parents like that it can be used with fewer than 8 panels if desired, and configured however they please. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Jd723

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I love how spacious it is. The only downfall is the suction cups on the bottom designed to hold the walls in place don’t stay stuck to our laminate floors. But it’s perfect for my 1 year old and my friend’s 3 year old can’t even get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Best Playpen
customer_reviews.text: We bought this playpen for our 8 months old granddaughter. Just love it, excellent quality, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: oalech

customer_reviews.title: This play yard is perfect for my newly mobile 8 month old
customer_reviews.text: This play yard is perfect for my newly mobile 8 month old. We love the color and the toys on the inside of one panel. I can place her in the playyard and know that she is safe. The reason I gave it 4/5 stars is because it is lightweight and slides easily. We fixed this by putting it up against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and he loves it-Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been an absolute lifesaver!!! Our little one was starting to crawl all over and this was the only thing that kept him contained while I cooked dinner, etc....Nice size and he loves it-Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: susan8047

customer_reviews.title: Baby leg got stuck
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. My kids leg got stuck in the gate and had to be cut out. Although it was very easy to assemble. Still a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, it's beautiful my grandkids loved it and it's nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R.

customer_reviews.title: Baby jail
customer_reviews.text: Keeps baby out of trouble for a little anyways. The stickers it comes with peel off pretty easy though, so if your kid is like mine careful they might peel and put into their mouth
customer_reviews.author: aequitas27k

customer_reviews.title: Works great and gives our son and US freedom!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great to keep our son in a safe, controlled place if we need him to be able to move around a bit while we cook or clean. Easily moves from one shape to the next if we need to change it, which we have a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: a playpen that he can't climb out of
customer_reviews.text: Great playpen. Love how the panels have vertical openings so my little one can't climb out. Wish it had a couple more panels. Or the option to buy additional panels.
customer_reviews.author: Jun V

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Baby Cage
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets and set up the ultimate baby cage for our busy eight month old baby boy. Keeps him safe and happy and it is ridiculously easy to set up. We use it on a tile floor and the suction cups keep it safe and secure. Then on the inside we have foam exercise squares. A must-have for any parent who wants to preserve a modicum of sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great play ground
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy. Nice colors and multiples ways and shapes to ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: CJCC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Safe
customer_reviews.text: My son in 9 months old and really active and strong. He loves the playpen! It is sturdy and withstands him constantly holding onto the panels and working himself around the perimeter. I wish it was cheaper though; it’s just plastic.
customer_reviews.author: wayne wood

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 9month old son. Its easy to assemble except for manually putting the bear stickers then couple of days the stickers are falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Budz

customer_reviews.title: great play pen!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and love it! Easy to put together, sturdy, suction cups work great on our hardwood floor. Gate latch is super easy to use on this. Within a min, my 7mth old crawled over to the spinning balls to play with them. Also got the patchwork mat (based on the previous reviews) and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Slinkard

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old was able to climb right over it. I think it would work for a one year old or younger that's about it. Its also easly moved along the floor. So a kid can easily push it around.
customer_reviews.author: Judah D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The pen is very sturdy, easy to put together, a nice size, and has a door. Also there is a panel with built in toys the baby likes. My son is 10 months and he is able to pull up on the sides of the pen and is not able to move or bend the structure. Very safe and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Star

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my rowdy 8 month old!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son who is crawling (and now standing). I needed a place to put him that gave him enough space and freedom to explore but kept him safe. Very simple to assemble and works fine on our carpet. Very durable. My baby loves to kick and the walls kinda bend outward but never open. like other reviewers, I skipped the teddy bear stickers. play yard looks great without it. Ordered from KIDZONE and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Arciniega

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! After researching all the other baby playpens I chose this one since it already had a little gate. It was very easy to assemble. I didn't put the stickers on due to the reviews of them falling off. And it's big enough to where I can fit in it with the baby too :)
customer_reviews.author: christine briceland

product_meta.title: Kidzone Interactive Baby Playpen 8 Panel Safety Gate Children Play Center Home Child Activity Pen ASTM Certified (Pink- Purple- Yellow)
product_meta.description:
Color:Pink- Purple- Yellow

Kidzone brand new 8 panel child's playpen offers parents a safe convenient solution for baby care and play. This play-pen features ball spinners, and telephone which encourages interest and mobility for your child. Swinging hinged door with safety lock ensures your child is safe. The size of this playpen can increase or decrease by removing or adding panels. Includes rubber suction cups to secure playpen to floor on flat/hard surfaces.

Features:
Activity Board: Picture house, play phone, spinning balls stimulates your child brain and motor skills
Flexible Shape- You can use all 8 panels to design any shape that fits your home. Create a square, rectangle, hexagon or octagon for a convenient solution for baby care and play
Baby Safe - Perfect for babies and toddlers. Gap-less wall design ensures your babies arm and legs are completely safe unlike our competitors
Safety Lock- Comes with locking gate that is very secure and a great feature to walk in and out your toddlers of the playpen
Strong and Sturdy- Works great on a carpet or hardwood floor. If placed on hardwood floors, included suction cups on each panel stick to the floor 
Designed for Stimulation - The fun and colorful pieces on the panels are educational and great for the child to play with and enjoy. It will keep your little one safe while they learn and explore
Easy to Assembly - Assembly in minutes. No tools or screws required
BPA and LEAB free - We designed our Play Pen with the child's safety in mind. Feel safe knowing our pen is designed non-toxic materials 
Safety test passed US(ASTM) - F1004-18

Specifications:
Color: Pink- Purple- Yellow
Material: PE
Activity Board: Picture House, Play Phone, Spinning Balls
Assembled Dimension: 8 Panels Assembled Diameter 61-1/4 inches
Individual Panels: 29-3/4"(W) X 24-3/8"(H) 
Thickness: 1-1/4" Approx.

Package Includes:
8 Panel Playpen Set
feature_bullets: 【Flexible Shape】You can use all 8 panels or less, it’s up to you, this feature along with the ability to shape it be it square, rectangle, hexagon or octagon gives you full control to create any size play space for your child that will fit anywhere in your house, in middle of a room or in a corner
【Safety Lock】Comes with locking gate that is very secure and a great feature to walk in and out your toddler of the playpen
【8 Panels】8 Panels that are interchangeable To increase Or decrease playpen size Or shape
【Playpen】The fun and colorful pieces on the panels are educational and great for the child to work with and enjoy. It will keep your little one safe while they learn and explore

【Strong and Sturdy】Works great on a carpet or hardwood floor. If you place it on hardwood floor, there are suction cups on each panel and they stick to it for stability Individual Panels :29-3/4"(W) X 24-3/8"(H)
